description.fr: {CharacterName:596} utilise l'appeau de {CharacterName:654} pour attirer les Shushus vers la faille de son île, et décide de partir seul au combat.
description.en: {CharacterName:596}'s using {CharacterName:654}'s bird call to draw the Shushus to the rift on his island and has decided to fight them alone.
description.es: {CharacterName:596} utiliza el señuelo de {CharacterName:654} para atraer a los fab'huritus a la grieta de su isla, y decide ir solo al combate.
description.de: {CharacterName:596} nutzt die Pfeife von {CharacterName:654}, um die Shushus zum Riss auf seiner Insel zu locken, und beschließt, alleine in den Kampf zu ziehen.
description.pt: {CharacterName:596} usa o apito de {CharacterName:654} para atrair os Shushus para a fenda da sua ilha e decide partir sozinho para o combate.

descriptionFinished.fr: {CharacterName:596} a enfin percé le mystère de l'immortalité des Shushus\_; {Summoning:1009}, une puissante démone, utilisait ses capacités obscures pour les ramener continuellement à la vie. Au terme d'un combat endiablé, {CharacterName:596} n'a désormais plus qu'une hâte\_: tout raconter à Pipoune\_!
descriptionFinished.en: {CharacterName:596} has finally solved the mystery of the Shushus' immortality. {Summoning:1009}, a powerful demon, was using her dark skills to bring them back to life constantly. After a devilish battle, {CharacterName:596} is eager to tell Dal-Dal everything!
descriptionFinished.es: {CharacterName:596} ha desentrañado por fin el misterio de la inmortalidad de los fab'huritus; {Summoning:1009}, una poderosa demonia, utilizaba sus oscuras habilidades para devolverlos a la vida una y otra vez. Tras un combate frenético, {CharacterName:596} está deseando hacer una cosa: ¡contárselo todo a Pipún!
descriptionFinished.de: {CharacterName:596} hat endlich das Geheimnis der Unsterblichkeit der Shushus enthüllt. {Summoning:1009}, eine mächtige Dämonin, nutzte ihre finsteren Fähigkeiten, um sie immer wieder ins Leben zurückzuholen. Am Ende eines wilden Kampfes hat {CharacterName:596} nur noch einen Gedanke: Das alles Schneckchen zu erzählen!
descriptionFinished.pt: {CharacterName:596} finalmente resolveu o mistério da imortalidade dos Shushus: {Summoning:1009}, uma poderosa demônia, estava utilizando suas habilidades obscuras para mantê-los sempre vivos. Após um combate infernal, {CharacterName:596} só deseja uma coisa: ir contar tudo para Pampito!
